mapper.select: SELECT D.GRADERANK_NO, GRADERANK_RANK, GRADERANK_MAX GRADERANK_MIN, EVALPOLICY_CODE, GRADERANK_RATIO FROM OPENSEMESTER B LEFT OUTER JOIN EVALUATIONPOLICY C ON(B.OPENSEME_NO = C.OPENSEME_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN GRADERANK D ON(C.EVALPOLICY_CODE = D.EVALPOLICY_CODE) WHERE B.OPENSEME_NO = #{openseme_no}
